DOM.p: Another important measure is to avoid obvious indications you are away. Be sure not to leave valuables out in the open where they can easily be seen. Have your mail held or ask a neighbor to collect it regularly, just don't let it pile up while you're away. It is also a good idea to keep curtains and shades closed so no one can look inside and determine you are away.
